# ShopKeeper Pro - Android POS Application

## Project Overview
This is a modern Android Point of Sale (POS) system designed specifically for small shops and senior citizens. The app features a calculator-like interface with simplified sales entry and expense tracking capabilities.

## Current Project Status
- ✅ Project Requirements Clarified
- ✅ Android Project Scaffolded
- ✅ Custom ShopKeeper Pro Implementation
- ✅ Required Extensions Installed
- ✅ Project Compilation Complete
- ✅ Build Task Created and Launched
- ✅ Project Launched Successfully
- ✅ Documentation Complete

## Key Features Implemented
- **Simple Sales Interface**: Inline input fields for items (Podipp, Chilly, Malli, Unda)
- **Real-time Calculation**: Automatic total calculation as user types
- **Multi-user Support**: User authentication and tracking
- **Expense Management**: Track expenses with categories
- **Material Design 3**: Modern, senior-friendly UI design
- **MVVM Architecture**: Clean separation of concerns with ViewModels
- **Room Database**: Local SQLite database for data persistence
- **Firebase Integration**: Cloud sync and authentication ready

## Development Architecture
- **Language**: Kotlin
- **Architecture Pattern**: MVVM with Repository
- **Database**: Room (SQLite)
- **UI Framework**: Material Design 3 with ViewBinding
- **Navigation**: Navigation Component
- **Async Processing**: Coroutines + Flow
- **Cloud Backend**: Firebase (Firestore, Authentication)

## Project Completion
All required development phases have been successfully completed. The application is ready for use with a simplified, senior-friendly interface featuring direct sales entry without complex popups or navigation.
